subtitle: Who is the creator of the Meshk?
description:
Altuğ Öncü, born in Istanbul in 1981, started his music education at the age of 12 by taking ud lessons at the Anatolian Side Musicians and Music Lovers Association. He continued his education at Üsküdar Music Society, Avni Akyol Istanbul Anatolian Fine Arts High School, Marmara University Music Education Department, and Istanbul University State Conservatory.
 He has worked on stage and in the studio with various famous Turkish artists such as Tarkan, Ajda Pekkan, Nilüfer, Nazan Öncel, Ziynet Sali, Yaşar, Göksel, and Yonca Lodi. 
 He has played as an instrumentalist in various TV series soundtracks such as Yaprak Dökümü, Menekşe ile Halil, Aşk-ı Memnu, Fatmagül’ün Suçu Ne?, İçerde, Bu Şehir Arkandan Gelecek, Poyraz Karayel, Kara Ekmek, Kiralık Aşk, Adı Efsane, Uçurum, Çilek Kokusu, Acil Aşk Aranıyor, Aşk ve Mavi.
